title: Arrow
content: Function: Shoot it at enemies with bow to deal damage
How to Use: Click where you want to shoot

title: Diamnond Mace
content: Function: Harms and cuts down trees
How to Use: Press space to swing the mace around you

title: Iron Axe
content: Function: Harms and cuts down trees
How to Use: Press space to swing axe

title: Iron Axe
content: Function: Harms and cuts down trees
How to Use: Press space to swing axe

title: Iron Pickaxe
content: Function: Harms and cuts down trees
How to Use: Press space to swing pickaxe at a rock

title: Jade Knife
content: Function: Harms and cuts down trees
How to Use: Press space to stab with knife

title: Knife
content: Function: Harms and cuts down trees
How to Use: Press space to stab with knife

content: Function: Harms and cuts down trees
How to Use: Press space to swing axe
Recipe: Iron Axe and one bone

content: Function: Harms and cuts down trees

Recipe: Stone Axe and one bone

content: Function: Harms and cuts down trees

Recipe: Wood Axe and one bone

title: Spear
content: Function: Shoot it at enemies to deal damage
How to Use: Click where you want to throw and it will boomerang there and back

content: Function: Harms and cuts down trees

content: Function: Shoot it at enemies to deal damage

title: Shovel
content: Function: Use it to harvest plants
How to Use: Press space to shovel

title: Bow
content: Function: Use it to shoot arrows
How to Use: click where you want to shoot

title: Stick
content: How to find: Chop down trees with axe

title: Log
content: How to find: Chop down trees with axe

title: Iron Ore
content: How to find: Mine rocks with pickaxe
Use: Smelt in furnace to get iron

title: Stone
content: How to find: Mine rocks with pickaxe

title: Raw Bacon
content: Use: Cook on fire to get bacon

title: Bacon
content: How to get: cook raw bacon

title: Steak
content: Use: Cook on fire to get cooked steak

title: Hydromelon
content: How to get: harvest with shovel
How to find: they are in areas with extreme heat
Use: Eat it to get heat resistance

title: Crab
content: How to find: they like to hang out on beachs

title: Wheat
content: How to get: Harvest wheat plant in village

title: Seed
content: How to get: Harvest wheat plant in village

title: Strawberries
content: How to get: Harvest strawberry plant

title: Chillshroom
content: How to get: harvest with shovel
How to find: they are in areas with extreme cold
Use: Eat it to get heat resistance

title: Coal
content: How to find: Mine rocks with pickaxe
Use: fuel for furnace, makes torches and campfire

title: Iron
content: How to get: smelt iron ore in furnace

title: Furnace
content: How to use: click on it to open the furnace menu and the controls are on the menu
Use: smelts items and lights up dark areas

title: Portal
content: Use: place it and enter it to teleport to a boss dimension
